item.title: Amplify
item.description: Over the last couple of days, I decided to take a bit of a dive into AWS’s Amplify service and see what exactly it had to offer in terms of creating and deploying a web-based application. As Amazon describes it, “AWS Amplify is a set of purpose-built tools and features that lets frontend web and mobile developers quickly and easily build full-stack applications”, so I was curious to see really how quick and easy this process was.
